entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling

Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
